entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 12:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
